Description: If unit's HP ≤ 50% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.
If unit's HP ≤ 40%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.
If unit is within 2 spaces of a cavalry or flying ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.
Grants weapon-triangle advantage against colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.
Grants weapon-triangle advantage against colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status on foe restricting movement to 1 space through its next action.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status on target and foes within 1 space of target restricting movement to 1 space through their next actions.

Grants Spd+3. Calculates damage from staff like other weapons. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts 【Gravity】on target and foes within 1 space of target. <br><br>【Gravity】<br>Restricts target's movement to 1 space through its next action.
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-7 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk/Spd-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

If unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe during combat.<br>Effect:【Dagger ７】<br><br>【Dagger ７】<br>After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-７ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to target or targeting ally and allies within 2 spaces of unit and target or targeting ally for 1 turn after movement. (Excludes unit.)
If unit is within 2 spaces of a flying or infantry ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.
Effective against infantry foes.<br>After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-4 on infantry foe through its next action.
Effective against infantry foes.<br />After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-6 on infantry foe through its next action.

At start of combat, if unit's Atk > foe's Atk, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.<br>Effect:【Dagger ７】<br><br>【Dagger ７】<br>After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-７ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe on the enemy team with the lowest Spd through its next action.
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.
If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). Effective against flying foes.
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). Effective against flying foes. If foe's Def ≥ foe's Res+5, deals +7 damage.
Effective against flying foes.<br />In combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.
Effective against flying foes. In combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.
Effective against flying foes. If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.
If unit initiates combat, inflicts status on foe restricting movement to 1 space through its next action.
Effective against armored foes. At start of combat, if foe's Atk ≥ unit's Atk+3, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
